name: gumBOvile
description: Gumbovile is a virtual island located in the middle of Never ending Ocean, it that combines play-to-earn and learn-to-earn mechanics. It aims to revolutionize the traditional world of business, education, and gaming by providing users and creators with direct ownership of their in-game items, all within a transparent and tamper-proof ecosystem. Gumbovile is a cross-platform experience that can be accessed via PC and VR, enabling gamers and investors to play, learn, explore, and experience its immersive and interactive environment.
